Row.Text: Razing compensation
Compensation paid out to the owner of a razed city
City Razing Survival Rate
Average percentage of a razed cities population that relocates to nearby cities (each point being a 10% chance per pop)
Deterministic Pop Resettlement
If enabled, the designated percentage of a razed cities populations always relocates: otherwise each pop will have a fixed chance of successful escape
Raze instantly (Civ 6 Razing)
Raze over time (Civ 5 Razing)
City Razing Behavior
Razed Cities are removed instantly: default Civilization 6 behavior
Razed Cities become free cities and are razed over time: Mimicks Civilization 5 behavior
Set if Cities are razed instantly, or if they get razed over multiple turns
No pop will survive a razed city
approximately 10% of a cities population will migrate to other cities
approximately 20% of a cities population will migrate to other cities
approximately 30% of a cities population will migrate to other cities
approximately 40% of a cities population will migrate to other cities
approximately 50% of a cities population will migrate to other cities
approximately 60% of a cities population will migrate to other cities
approximately 70% of a cities population will migrate to other cities
approximately 80% of a cities population will migrate to other cities
approximately 90% of a cities population will migrate to other cities
All pops that survive the initial capture will migrate to other cities
Nothing
Free Settler
Free Builder
Gold
Faith
Science
Culture
The owner of a razed city gets no compensation
The owner of a razed city gets a free settler
The owner of a razed city gets a free builder
The owner of a razed city gets 3 turns worth of gold
The owner of a razed city gets 3 turns worth of faith
The owner of a razed city gets 3 turns worth of science
The owner of a razed city gets 3 turns worth of culture
Razed City Owner
Who gets compensated for a razed city?
Original Owner
Previous Owner
The player who founded the city originally gets compensated
The player who most recently held the city before capture gets compensated
